org.rockholla.xml
Class XmlDocument

java.lang.Object
  org.jdom.Document
      org.rockholla.xml.XmlDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jdom.Parent
public class XmlDocument
extends org.jdom.Document

An XML Document representation, based on a JDOM document

Author:
rockholla
See Also:
Document, Serialized Form

hashMapToElement

public static org.jdom.Element hashMapToElement(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> hashMap,
                                                java.lang.String rootElementName,
                                                java.lang.String childElementNames,
                                                boolean forceNamesUpperCase)
Converts a HashMap Java object to an XML JDom Element like: 
 <rootElementName>
      <childElementNames name="1_1">
           <childElementNames name="2_1" value="HashMap Value"/>
           <childElementNames name="2_2" value="HashMap Value"/>
      </childElementNames>
 </rootElementName>

Parameters:
hashMap - the HashMap to convert
rootElementName - the root element name that will wrap the HashMap items converted to elements
childElementNames - the name of all constructed XML elements inside the root element
forceNamesUpperCase - whether the name attributes of the constructed XML elements will be forced uppercase (mimic CF StructToXml default)
Returns:
the constructed XML element wrapping the HashMap items converted to elements

hashMapItemToElement

public static org.jdom.Element hashMapItemToElement(java.lang.String hashMapItemKey,
                                                    java.lang.Object hashMapItem,
                                                    java.lang.String elementName,
                                                    boolean forceNamesUpperCase)
Converts a single HashMap to an XML JDom element

Parameters:
hashMapItemKey - the key or name of this HashMap item
hashMapItem - the HashMap item object
elementName - the XML element name
forceNamesUpperCase - whether the name attributes of the constructed XML elements will be forced uppercase (mimic CF StructToXml default)
Returns:
the constructed XML element representing the HashMap

public boolean isValid(java.lang.String schemaFileLocation)
                throws XmlValidationException
Determines the validity of this XML document based on the designated schema

Parameters:
schemaFileLocation - the local location of the schema file
Returns:
true if it validates
Throws:
XmlValidationException
